snippet: An Indiana aid worker threatened with beheading by the Islamic State group said in a June letter that he's afraid to die and is saddened by the pain his captivity must be causing his family, his parents said Sunday....

headline.print_headline: Indiana Aid Worker Says in Letter Is Afraid to Die
headline.main: Parents of Indiana Aid Worker Plead With ISIS for His Release

lead_paragraph: An Indiana aid worker threatened with beheading by the Islamic State group said in a June letter that he's afraid to die and is saddened by the pain his captivity must be causing his family, his parents said Sunday.
